org.jclouds.cloudsigma

Interface CloudSigmaAsyncClient


  • public interface CloudSigmaAsyncClient
    Provides asynchronous access to CloudSigma via their REST API.

    Author:
    Adrian Cole
    See Also:
    CloudSigmaClient,
